full of cheaters...
EDIT: After all this years since the original review, I have to say that there aren't as many cheaters as before, that means, after this update, or even before, (which I totally don't really like it/approve it since it's just literally another way for Valve to get money and ruining the experience for many users without bad intentions, for example, after the update, if someone was almost leveling up to level 21 and getting prime, they wouldn't get it, and would have to pay in order to be able to get levels and ranks), the quantity of cheaters have decreased since there are no way to get ranks and levels without having to pay for prime.
Concluding, I actually recommend the game at this time, since your game experience won't be ruined for cheaters, like before. (FYI, before, (like 1/2 years ago) in every 5 competitive matches you would play, in all the matches you would find a cheater, usually a beyblade.)
Even without prime, you can do whatever you used to (if you played before), for example, play competitive and all other games, but you won't be in the same lobbies as the prime users, unless they select to play competitive without being able to get ranks.
Hope this clarifies your doubts about the game after the new update.

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is a great fps game to play. I'm always grouping up with some friends for some casual matches and occasionally some competitive ones too. Only thing I wish the developers would work on is aggressively combat all the hackers on this game cause there are many that slip by with undetected programs.
Great Game.LOT  of hackers from gold nova 2 onwards to maintain their ranks"petty ego" that ruins the experience of the match making. Lot of great players and toxic too.
